name: Green Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw  taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Woodland Stalker
special_abilities.desc: When in a forested area, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks.
